t1.name: Regular Red Apple
t1.description:
Apple, meet the world's favourite apple for snacks.

The heart-shaped delicious apple has a bright surface. This delicious apple shines in fresh, crisp salads, for its crunchy texture and lightly sweet taste.

t1.name: Carrots (Nantes Variety)
t1.description:
Carrots, a healthy root vegetable freshly grown from local farms around the area.

Carrots are one of the most popular and widely used vegetables in the world. Come in 1 kg weighed bag format only. Also available in Baby and Danvers varieties.
